definition: from this, it can be seen that...
to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
this/these
see 可汗[ke4 han2]
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to appear/also written 現|现[xian4]
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: From the above-mentioned story we can see that Mencius mother realized the importance of environment for children's development.
sentences.chinese: 由此可见，孟母深知环境对孩子成长的影响。

sentences.english: Thus prepositional logic can only expressparts of the logic rules.
sentences.chinese: 由此可见，命题逻辑只反映了一部分逻辑规律。

sentences.english: That's why Yu-Fu Era is considered as the transfer time of ancient Shu.
sentences.chinese: 由此可见鱼凫时代为古蜀社会转型期。

sentences.english: This shows, gesso building materials not only performance is good, also be green building materials.
sentences.chinese: 由此可见，石膏建材不仅性能好，也是绿色建材。

sentences.english: This shows, the sort that does not cause next lumbago diseases with the crowd is different.
sentences.chinese: 由此可见，不同人群导致下腰痛疾病的种类不同。

sentences.english: Thus it can be seen that Shangguan Wan'er was quite an influential poet in the early Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 由此可见，上官婉儿在初唐诗坛是有一定影响的诗人。

sentences.english: Therefore, FLS are crucial effector in joint inflammation and destruction.
sentences.chinese: 由此可见，FLS是关节炎症和破坏的主要效应细胞。

sentences.english: It will take something very special to avoid relegation.
sentences.chinese: 由此可见，要想避免降级，莱切得好好费些思量。

sentences.english: This tragic brutal bet, bet without lost on the battlefield.
sentences.chinese: 由此可见赌之悲惨，赌之残酷毫不输于战场杀敌。

sentences.english: So the magnetic mirror parameters have significant effect on the ion energy distributions.
sentences.chinese: 由此可见，磁镜场参数对离子能量分布有很大影响。

sentences.english: Thus it can be seen that dragon formation have close relationships with worship of water deity.
sentences.chinese: 由此可见，龙的形成与水神崇拜密切相关。

sentences.english: Thus, by the relationship between the people always retain the Xiasheng down.
sentences.chinese: 由此可见，靠关系留住人始终都是落了下乘。

sentences.english: Fig4. Therefore, should be inverse ratio btw IQ and happiness.
sentences.chinese: 由此可见，智商和快乐成反比。

sentences.english: Thus, the richness of its literature life, rather to be examined.
sentences.chinese: 由此可见，其艺文生命的丰富性颇值得探究。

sentences.english: This shows that discipline class adviser's work is "working in the contemporary era and Benefit future generations."
sentences.chinese: 由此可见，班主任的工作“功在当代，利在千秋。”

sentences.english: China has become a country of old type population.
sentences.chinese: 由此可见，我国开始步入了老年型人口国家的行列。

definition: it can clearly be seen (that this is the case)/it is (thus) clear/clear/visible
it goes to show that/one can see
it is obvious that.../as one can well imagine...
indeed/true! (I agree with you)
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
lit. one spot (on the leopard)/fig. one small item in a big scheme
it goes without saying/it is self-evident
thus/consequently/as a result
moreover/besides
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
equivalent to/appropriate/considerably/to a certain extent/fairly/quite
it could even be said
certainty/without a doubt
admittedly (it's true that...)
in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
not only that, but ...
